titleStmt.title: A briefe of the Bible drawne first into English poësy, and then illustrated by apte annotations: togither vvith some other necessary appendices. By Henoch Clapham.
titleStmt.author: Clapham, Henoch.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, printer to the Kings Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio regio.
"The second part of the Bibles brief" has separately dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
